articles.description: Shares of Amber Enterprises have tumbled about 21 per cent in the last one month, whereas the counter has remained flat in the last one year. The scrip has eroded about one third of its value from its 52-week low of Rs 4,023.65.
articles.content:
New Delhi: Shares of plunged as much as 17 per cent in early morning on Monday, following a poor set of numbers in the quarter ended March 2022.
